alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clay; Kanawha; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 12:34PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Calhoun, northern Kanawha, southern Roane and north central Clay Counties through 115 PM EST... At 1233 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Charleston, or near Charleston, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Jefferson, South Charleston, Dunbar, Sissonville, Clendenin, Elkview, Amma, Nebo, Tariff, Walton, Left Hand, Orma, Looneyville and Chloe. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 32. Interstate 77 in West Virginia near mile marker 101, and between mile markers 103 and 110. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 51 and 57. Route 119 between mile markers 75 and 78, and near mile marker 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
